title: PBC on Spike: Stevenson Blows Away Karpency in Third
content: PBC on Spike: Stevenson Blows Away Karpency in Third September 11, 2015 by Steve in Featured, News with 0 Comments It was the result virtually everybody expected: Tommy Karpency being taken off his feet and one way or another, being stopped in the main event of PBC on Spike’s latest Friday Night Lights Out telecast. Tagged Sherdog News
